text: Kendriya Vidyalaya, Patiala is a higher-secondary co-education government school in the Patiala city of Punjab, India. The school was founded in 1974 and is affiliated to the Central Board of Secondary Education of India. The school is administered by the Kendriya Vidyalaya Trust. == References == Category:Kendriya Vidyalayas Category:Co-educational schools in India Category:High schools and secondary schools in Patiala Category:Educational institutions established in 1974 Category:1974 establishments in India
title: Kendriya Vidyalaya, Patiala
